resources.string:
1. Click Camera button if you found a snake. 
After taking picture, choose the kind of snake and upload it to server. If you don't know which snake it is, choose unknown picture. 

2. Click List button to see the list of reported snakes. 
Click any snake to see it's special first aid as well as it's specification. 

3. Click Map button to see the map of reported snakes. 

4. Click First Aid button to see General first aid for snake bites.

1. Remain calm and move beyond the snake's striking distance. 
2. Remove jewelry and tight clothing before you start to swell. 
3. Position yourself, if possible, so that the bite is at or below the level of your heart. 
4. Clean the wound, but don't flush it with water. Cover it with a clean, dry dressing.
